Text.Page:
It's so strange that they'd choose to poison me nowâ€”it's not like they don't know me. I've been selling wares here for quite some time.

After I was incapacitated, though, they took my things and ran off.

Do you suppose you could collect my belongings for me? I'm sure they're at the Babok Hollow west of here.

Yes, that's it! Thank you so much!

And here is something for you.
Without my merchandise, I'm lost. Please, can you go retrieve it for me?
